content.query:
USE globantdb
GO
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.jobs
GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.jobs
    (
        id INT,
        job VARCHAR(255)
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'jobs/jobs.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = globantacc,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/jobs'
    );
GO
SELECT * FROM bronze.jobs
